::Rex::

Rex sighs at her words, not slowing down. People have tried to help him in 
the past, but nothing had worked. He was still, and always would be, filled 
with hatred for the Predacons, for what they had done.

"No, it's all-AHH!" Rex loses his balance as Battera falls on him, his gun 
flying out of his hand and sliding across the floor. He momentarily wonders 
wether that was an accident or an attack, finally deciding to be cautious.

With a quick motion, he rolls away from her, jumping to his feet with a 
pistol in his hand. "What was the meaning of that?!"
